release.action: Merged from platform 4, CodePress, Transcorners and Behaviour for mootools javascripts.
Merged with most of platform 4 stuff except for accordion
Added style classes for different states of accordion object and removed ugly default styles set in .js file.
the panels in the Accordion Object are now stored in a facet
Bugfix from HEAD. The version number for scriptaculous was wrong.
Declaration of version for including in ePlatform release 3.1
Web 2.0 module created which includes several javascript libraries such as Scriptaculous, Behaviour, Reflection and Prototype Lite.
